courses.title: Full-Stack Web Development
courses.description: Modern front-end and back-end development, projects and deployment.

lessons.title: Introduction to the Course
content: In this course you will build real projects and deploy them.

lessons.title: HTML Basics
content: HTML creates the structure of webpages.
Learn about tags, elements, attributes and semantic HTML.

lessons.title: CSS Styling
content: CSS styles pages and creates layout.
Understand Flexbox, Grid, responsive design, and animations.

lessons.title: JavaScript Essentials
content: JavaScript adds interactivity to the web.
We'll cover DOM, events, fetch API, and basics of modern JS.

courses.title: Data Science Foundations
courses.description: Introductory data science: Python, data manipulation, visualization, simple ML.

lessons.title: What is Data Science?
content: Data Science combines coding, math, and domain knowledge.
You will learn tools used in the industry.

lessons.title: Python Basics
content: Python is the most popular language for data science.
We'll learn about variables, lists, and basic pandas usage.
